name: smart-laundry-system
description: Enterprise-grade smart laundry management platform with AI/ML integration, blockchain payments, and IoT device management

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:laundry" "npm run dev:payment" "npm run dev:notification" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:auth && npm run build:laundry && npm run build:payment && npm run build:notification && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:ai
scripts.install:backend: cd backend/auth-service && npm install && cd ../laundry-service && npm install && cd ../payment-service && npm install && cd ../notification-service && npm install && cd ../api-gateway && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: cd backend/auth-service && npm test && cd ../laundry-service && npm test
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend/auth-service && npm run lint && cd ../laundry-service && npm run lint

author: Smart Laundry Team
